description: Mahamarakkalage Sashi Saham Pathum    Vs    Hon. Attorney General, before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Mahamarakkalage Sashi Saham Pathum    Vs    Hon. Attorney General,
keywords: Attempted murder by stabbing – Alleged false implication – Elements needed to be satisfied in order to constitute the offence of attempted murder – Lack of evidence– Reduction of the offence from one of attempted murder under section 300 of the Penal Code to the offence of voluntarily causing hurt with a dangerous weapon,  an offence punishable under section 315 of the Penal Code.
legistation: Section 300 of the Penal Code. - Section 315 of the Penal Code.
